channel.title: sync on notes
channel.description: Recent content in sync on notes

item.description: envelope decision meeting w/ kloans kickoff explanation: my understanding is that option 2 is the current standard, but I can see how the standard could interpretted to imply option 1 needs clarification decision doc should either clarify standard or define reasons for why bypassing the decision is acceptable meeting notes: Ben - went over options & requirements used to frame the decision doc. Ben - What is the primary concern with option 2 / following the existing standard?

talked w/ rob about combining lamp teams sooner rather than later. he agreed in general & had other thoughts about re-settling mike & mike sooner rather than later as well tf sync w/ mason tf testing options Terratest, aws resources in go Tf compliance, behavior style Tf init, validate, plan, apple, destroy in a hermetic aws space need to meet w/ Mason & Satish to integrate lambda w/ ccg Regulators / Marketing tech stack stack
